info.title: Service Contract - Read (A2X)
info.description: You can use this service to integrate external applications with service contract processing in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. The service contains entities of service contract header, header text, item text, item, item object list, item product list, item price element, item released order, and billing request line. In each API call, you can use the operation to retrieve service contracts. You can apply any of the filters provided or retrieve all existing data.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve service contracts using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Service Header (CRMS4_SERV_H)
* Service Item (CRMS4_SERV_I)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Retrieves service contract header.
get.description: Retrieves details of service contract header. The details include service contract description, release status, sales organization, sold-to party, and so on.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Retrieves service contract item from billing request line by service contract ID, item number and billing request line ID.
get.description: Retrieves details of service contract item from billing request line using service contract ID, item number, and billing request line ID. The details include service contract item description, item category, release status, product ID, quantity and so on.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
